title: Create multi-analysis-synthesizer for coordinating parallel analysis workflows

description.summary: Missing coordinator for parallel analysis workflows (exploration-analyst, research-analyst, sales-analyst coordination). Required for complex analysis tasks requiring multiple specialist coordination.
description.business_value: Enhanced analysis capability through coordinated specialist deployment
description.technical_scope: Develop coordinator agent for parallel analysis workflow management
success_criteria: Coordinates parallel deployment of analysis specialists

functional: Coordinate parallel deployment of: exploration-analyst, research-analyst, sales-analyst
Synthesize JSON results from multiple analysis streams
technical: Integration with operations folder for JSON result storage
Coordination with report-generator for final output

implementation.approach: Deploy coordination specialist with parallel processing capabilities
implementation.architecture: Analysis coordination framework with result synthesis
implementation.validation: Multi-stream analysis validation and result verification
implementation.testing: Parallel workflow testing and synthesis validation

risks.mitigation: Structured workflow management and clear agent boundaries

acceptance_criteria: Agent coordinates parallel analysis deployment successfully
Synthesizes multi-source results into coherent reports
